mods.abstract: This booklet pertaining to Area 8 (Western Kurdistan) was compiled by the General Staff of the British Forces in Iraq and published in 1923. It is meant as a practical field guide to military forces operating in Iraq, and is one of ten editions covering various areas of the country. The content of the booklet covers history, geography, climate, natural resources, ethnography, tribal populations, important personalities, communications and Turkish military readiness and capabilities in each region.
